channel.title: Post your favorite game links here! (Any console)
channel.description:
Post links to any game!
If it's for a console, post a link to the games site. If it's a PC online game, post a link to the actual game.
Format:
[u][b]Game Name: Console: Link:[/b][/u]
Example:
[u][b]Game Name:[/b][/u] RuneScape [u][b]Console:[/b][/u] PC Online [u][b]Link:[/b][/u] http://www.runescape.com

item.title: Post your favorite game links here! (Any console)
